content.text: Paul Faust, is a fictional character played by the actor of the same name in the television series The Office. Faust is one of few of the fictional characters in the television series who received the same first and last name as their actor, similar to Creed Bratton.

Paul Faust is the owner of Disaster Kits Limited, one of the other businesses that operating in Scranton Business Park. Some people call him "Cool Guy Paul". In the episode Chair Model, W.B. Jones Heating & Air goes under renovations and their construction vehicles take up parking spaces. As a result of this, the leaders of the "Five Families" of the business park is called to discuss the parking problem. The problem is resolved quickly.
